query: Five houses in a row (1 leftmost to 5 rightmost). Each house has a unique color (red, blue, green, yellow, white), owner (Alice, Ben, Cara, Diego, Ezra), pet (dog, cat, bird, fish, rabbit), drink (tea, coffee, milk, juice, water), hobby (chess, painting, running, cooking, music). Clues: 1) Alice lives in the red house. 2) The green house is immediately to the right of the white house. 3) The person who drinks coffee lives in the green house. 4) The chess player owns the bird. 5) The yellow house owner likes running. 6) The middle house occupant drinks milk. 7) Ben lives in the first house. 8) The blue house is next to the first house. 9) The person who likes music drinks water. 10) The fish owner lives next to the person who likes cooking. 11) Cara likes painting. 12) Diego lives next to the person who drinks juice. 13) The rabbit owner lives next to the yellow house. Question: Who owns the fish and who drinks water? Also list the full house order (1-5) with color, owner, pet, drink, hobby.
